name: Dark Cave
description:
You wake up in a cave.

( There is a issue between HTML5 version and Firefox, I'm so sad about that.
Download the game or use a Chromium-derivated browser instead. )

A game made by Pikario with Godot 3 and Piskel.

This work is free as in freedom, let's share knowledge <3
Source code available under GLPv3 and sprites under Creative Commons.
